definitions.definition: A motion of the limbs or body, especially one made to emphasize speech.
definitions.example: The middle-finger gesture is really a nonverbal swear.

definitions.definition: An act or a remark made as a formality or as a sign of attitude.
definitions.example: We took flowers as a gesture of sympathy.

definitions.definition: The manner of carrying the body; position of the body or limbs; posture.
To make a gesture or gestures.
definitions.example: My dad said to never gesture with my hands when I talk.

definitions.definition: To express something by a gesture or gestures.
To accompany or illustrate with gesture or action.
